actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House that the Secretary of Agriculture should rescind the food stamp regulations proposed on December 6, 1974.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the Secretary of Agriculture should rescind the food stamp regulations proposed on December 6, 1974 and take steps to insure that the elderly and the poor will continue to benefit from the food stamp program to the same extent which they presently do.

titles.title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House that the Secretary of Agriculture should rescind the food stamp regulations proposed on December 6, 1974.
